price: Kwa hakika katika haya yapo mazingatio kwa wanao ogopa.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ
footnotes: Hakika katika hadithi hiyo yapo mawaidha kwa mwenye kumkhofu Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
